title: The establishment strikes back, with Dave Wasserman & Melanie Mason
description: Tuesday's elections in California and across the country saw the prevailing of more moderate politicians over their farther-left and farther-right opponents. Dave Wasserman, House editor of the Cook Political Report, and Melanie Mason, national political correspondent for the LA Times, join Chuck to break down the establishment candidates' cruise to victory.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
